title: Find Familiar
content:
4 +0 Slashing. Scare: Lash at a creature to Frighten it. Invisibility: Become invisible until you attack or cast a spell. (Require concentration) 7 HP16 AC12m Speed5 Str17 Dex10 Con7 Int10 Wis10 Cha Scratch Bite: 1d6 +2 Piercing.HideDashJump (6m)DisengageHelp 5 HP14 AC (can apply mage armor for 15 AC)9m speed13 Str14 Dex12 Con3 Int12 Wis7 ChaProficiency +2Initiative +2

Sting: Sting a creature to deal 1d4+3 Piercing damage. Potentially deals an additional 1d6 poison.
